Good material and fits great!!
It's Long + slouchy + cozy! Paired it w fishnet stockings + a lil mini skirt + black combat boots. Love it
It is a little tight around the neck. The fabric is really nice, though. It's warm.
This sweater is very cute, but it’s not the like photos shown at all. It doesn’t hang, it fits like a regular sweatshirt- it’s fitted at the bottom and the sleeves. I would size up for sure.

评论概述: I could live in this sweater

Gold glitter is everywhere
Got a bunch of compliments on this sweater; i sized up for a more oversized look.
Cute top. I ordered it a size up, the graphic was a little small for the size of the garment, tho. But I'll wear it again next year!
Worked well for a Halloween type costume for work

After reading the reviews I was slightly hesitant to purchase being a plus sized gal. It is not super soft on the inside but thankfully it is not itchy either, and I tend to have more sensitive skin. It has been washed a couple times due to young children touching it, and the design has held up, as well as the shape. It was advertised as oversized but getting my normal size it is a bit more fitted than I had hoped so if you want the extra slouch I would size up. Not as soft and not as slouchy leads to 4 out of 5 stars.
Skeleton is a very glittery gold which doesn't really show up in the photo.

I love this shirt so much!! It’s so soft, comfy, true to size! I got so many compliments on it the first day I wore it, I wish I could wear it everyday! Pretty lightweight, not too hot- perfect for this time of year, and not too expensive! Win!

So far I’m in love! It is NOT like the photo just fyi and it has a tapered waist, which I prefer, and the sleeves I’m a little worried are almost too short and after a wash so I may exchange for a size large. The print is great though as is the feel of it!

评论概述: It doesn’t have to be October to wear
评论详情: I’m in my oversized sweater era, and with fall approaching I immediately searched me a skelly sweater.  If I could wear this everyday, I would. But I try to save it for a weekly treat. I get so many compliments regarding the fit, and it brings smiles to all the spooky girly pops.
Good/sturdy material, I really love it overall, I sized up one but it's not as oversized as I expected so if you want to wear it with just tights underneath I'd size up twice
Fits comfortably and feels amazing
Washed cold gentle cycle and hung dry.  Put it on and noticed this. Unfortunately I threw the packaging bag out. So unable to return?
She wears this all the time. Oversized and comfy.
The print was a little small on the size I got, and it showed up kinda smelly from the ink, but otherwise I got exactly what I was hoping for when I ordered this

Not too bad. Sizing is pretty normal, so I would suggest getting a size up if you want it oversized. The print on the shirt isn't as crisp as the photo shows and is missing lots of detail, but not bad.
Suelo ser talla mediana pero pedí extra grande para que quedara como en la foto. La tela está bien pero hay que usar algo más debajo de la sudadera en caso de frío.
